name: WebGLRenderingContext.getShaderSource
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.getShaderSource() method of the WebGL API returns the source code of a WebGLShader as a DOMString.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'getShaderSource' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.
